original_text: And the vision of the evening and the morning which was told is true: wherefore shut thou up the vision; for it shall be for many days.
korean_text: 이미 말한 바 주야에 대한 환상은 확실하니 너는 그 환상을 간직하라 이는 여러 날 후의 일임이라 하더라

sentences.original_text: And the vision of the evening and the morning
wherefore shut thou up the vision
for it shall be for many days
